mapper.select: SELECT a.semi_lot semi_lot, semi_use_yn(semi_lot) use_yn, a.prod_code prod_code, b.prod_name prod_name, a.semi_in_amt semi_in_amt, a.emp_code, a.prcs_list_code, c.emp_name emp_name, a.semi_ind semi_ind, a.semi_exd semi_exd FROM semi_in a JOIN com_prod b ON(a.prod_code = b.prod_code) LEFT JOIN com_emp c ON(a.emp_code = c.emp_code) ORDER BY a.semi_ind DESC
SELECT prod_code, prod_name FROM com_prod WHERE prod_kind = 'S' ORDER BY prod_code

SELECT a.prcs_list_code, a.prod_code, c.prod_name, a.test_amt, a.test_date FROM prod_quality a LEFT JOIN semi_in b ON(a.prcs_list_code = b.prcs_list_code) LEFT JOIN com_prod c ON(a.prod_code = c.prod_code) WHERE b.prcs_list_code IS NULL AND a.total_test_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY a.test_date DESC
SELECT a.prcs_list_code, a.prod_code, c.prod_name, a.test_amt, a.test_date FROM prod_quality a LEFT JOIN com_prod c ON(a.prod_code = c.prod_code) WHERE a.prcs_list_code = #{prcsListCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE prcs_ing SET prcs_dir_ing_sts = 'S5' WHERE prcs_dir_de_code = (SELECT prcs_dir_de_code FROM prcs_list WHERE prcs_list_code = #{prcsListCode}) AND prcs_code = (SELECT prcs_code FROM prcs_list WHERE prcs_list_code = #{prcsListCode})
